long_description: Take your tyke on a winter hike in the MSR Denali Tyker snowshoes. Two-strap bindings with heel stabilizers stay pliable and easy-to-adjust in cold temperatures, even for users wearing mittens. Steel crampons offer positive traction for climbing, and molded traction bars offer lateral stability for traversing side slopes. Molded brakes create a snowplow effect, providing grip for uphill and downhill travel. Injection-molded plastic design prevents ice and snow buildup. Fits children's shoe sizes 7.5 - 13.5 and sizes 1 to 4.5.
short_description: Take your tyke on a winter hike in the MSR Denali Tyker snowshoes.
